TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiBinding extends System.Windows.Data.BindingBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class MultiBinding Inherits BindingBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class MultiBinding : System::Windows::Data::BindingBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type MultiBinding = class inherit BindingBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 描述附加到单个绑定目标属性的 对象的集合。

span.span: Describes a collection of objects attached to a single binding target property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在一个对象中指定多个绑定 。You can specify multiple bindings in a object. 使用 带有转换器的对象时，它将基于这些绑定的值为绑定目标生成最终值。When you use the object with a converter, it produces a final value for the binding target based on the values of those bindings. 例如，可以从红色、蓝色和绿色值计算颜色，这些值可以是来自相同或不同绑定源对象的值。For example, color might be computed from red, blue, and green values, which can be values from the same or different binding source objects. 当值从目标移动到源时，目标属性值被转换为一组值，这些值反馈回绑定。When a value moves from the target to the sources, the target property value is translated to a set of values that are fed back into the bindings. 和属性的值 确定的功能 ，并将其用作集合中所有绑定的默认值，除非单个绑定将重写这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果将 对象的属性 设置为 ，则会考虑集合中的所有绑定， 除非你在 其中一个绑定上设置了不同的值。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties. 当前仅支持 类型的对象，而不支持 或 类型的对象。 currently supports only objects of type and not or .

value.span: 将 子级添加到 对象会将该子级隐式添加到 对象的 集合。

span.span: Adding a child to a object implicitly adds the child to the collection for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此属性只能 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 通过使用显示的语法来设置，或者通过访问集合对象并使用它的各种方法（如）来设置 `Add` 。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax that is shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用于访问集合对象的属性是只读的，而集合本身是可读/写的。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read/write. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreBindings**oneOrMoreBindings* 一个或多个 对象。One or more objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的各个绑定可以具有其自己的值 。Individual bindings in the collection can have their own value . 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *myConverter**myConverter* 对实现接口的类的资源引用 ，其中包括 和方法的实现 。A resource reference to a class that implements the interface, which includes implementations of the and methods. 若要引用值转换器，请使用 [标记扩展和 WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml)。To refer to a value converter, use the [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *converterParameter**converterParameter* 转换器所需的类型的值，它可能是对象元素或字符串，具体取决于所使用的属性类型和转换器的实现的定义和 XAML 功能。A value of the type expected by the converter, which might be an object element or a string depending on the definition and XAML capabilities both of the property type being used and of the implementation of the converter. 转换器通过 `parameter` 其和实现定义的参数获取该类型 。The converter takes in that type through the `parameter` parameter as defined by its and implementations.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此绑定的数据流的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow of this binding.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它返回目标依赖属性的默认绑定模式值。

span.span: The default value is , which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.

value.span: 但是，每个依赖属性的默认值都不同。

span.span: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.

value.span: 一般情况下，用户可编辑的控件属性（例如 ）默认为双向绑定，而其他大多数属性默认为单向绑定。

span.span: In general, user-editable control properties, such as , default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.

value.span: 确定依赖属性绑定在默认情况下是单向还是双向的编程方法是：使用 获取属性的属性元数据，然后检查 属性的布尔值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the Boolean value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性的值 确定的功能 ，并将其用作集合中所有绑定的默认值，除非单个绑定将重写这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果将 对象的属性 设置为 ，则会考虑集合中的所有绑定， 除非你在 其中一个绑定上设置了不同的值。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ShouldSerialize`提供此方法是因为 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要开发的设计器 或开发自己的包含的控件，通常需要调用此方法 。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个处理程序，可使用该程序提供自定义逻辑，旨在在更新绑定源值期间处理绑定引擎遇到的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

summary.span: 这仅适用于你已将 与 对象相关联的情况。

span.span: This is only applicable if you have associated the with your object.

value.span: 一个提供自定义逻辑以在绑定源值更新过程中处理绑定引擎遇到的异常的方法。

span.span: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个内置验证规则，该规则检查在绑定源属性更新过程中引发的异常。The class represents a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the binding source properties. 如果已将 对象与对象相关联 ，则可以使用此属性来设置处理程序，以提供用于处理这些异常的自定义逻辑。If you have associated the object with your object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions. 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see . 有关对象的验证过程的详细信息 ，请参阅 属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property.

span.span: A programmatic way to determine the default value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性的值 确定的功能 ，并将其用作集合中所有绑定的默认值，除非单个绑定将重写这些属性。The values of the and properties determine the functionality of the and are used as the default values for all the bindings in the collection unless an individual binding overrides these properties. 例如，如果将 对象的属性 设置为 ，则会考虑集合中的所有绑定， 除非你在 其中一个绑定上设置了不同的值。For example, if the property on the object is set to , then all the bindings in the collection are considered unless you set a different value on one of the bindings explicitly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 属性。For more information, see the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否包含 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the .

value.span: 如果包含 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to include the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性可提供显式使用元素的替代方法 。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是一个内置的验证规则，用于检查由源对象的实现所引发的错误 。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the implementation of the source object. 如果引发错误，则绑定引擎将创建一个 具有错误的，并将其添加到 绑定元素的集合中。If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a with the error and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 缺少错误会清除此验证反馈，除非其他规则引发验证问题。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 有关对象的验证过程的详细信息 ，请参阅 属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性可提供显式使用元素的替代方法 。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是一个内置的验证规则，它检查在源属性更新过程中引发的异常。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property. 如果引发异常，则绑定引擎将创建一个 具有异常的，并将其添加到 绑定元素的集合中。If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 缺少错误会清除此验证反馈，除非其他规则引发验证问题。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. 有关对象的验证过程的详细信息 ，请参阅 属性。For more information about the validation process for objects, see the property. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValidationRules As Collection(Of ValidationRule)

summary.span: 获取此 实例的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects for this instance of .

value.span: 此 实例的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects for this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在对象 和对象中的单个对象上设置验证规则 。You can set validation rules on both the object and the individual objects in the object. 当值从绑定目标属性移动到对象时，绑定引擎将计算对象上的 。The binding engine evaluates the on the object when a value moves from the binding target property to the object. 在此之后，当某个值从转换器移到单个绑定的 "绑定源" 属性时，绑定引擎将计算 该 对象的。After that, when a value moves from the converter to the binding source property of an individual binding, the binding engine evaluates the on that object. 有关验证过程的详细信息以及如何在失效时提供可视反馈，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)中的 "数据验证"。For more information about the validation process and how to provide visual feedback upon invalidation, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). > [!NOTE] > 此属性只能 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 通过使用显示的语法来设置，或者通过访问集合对象并使用其各种方法（如）来设置 `Add` 。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 用于访问集合对象的属性是只读的，而集合本身是可读写的。The property used to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreValidationRules**oneOrMoreValidationRules* 一个或多个 对象。One or more objects. 可以使用类， 也可以通过为类创建自定义规则 。You can use the class or create your custom rules by subclassing the class.

span.span: Binding Validation Sample
